caption.text: Salts for the preparation of the simulated body fluid used in this study in the order of mixing.

statement.text: Reagent KH 2 PO 4 salt has Lowest Concentration.
Reagent NaCl salt has highest Concentration .
Reagent NaCl salt has Lowest Concentration .

caption.text: Trace elements found in the extruded material as determined by glow discharge mass spectroscopy. Only elements with concentrations above 1 ppm wt. are listed.

statement.text: Al, Si, Fe, Ni, Pb are five trace elements given in the table.

caption.text: Grading of fracture consolidation including respective definition and reference to sample images.

cell.text: The fracture gap is visible in all three planes; fracture margins have sharp limitations.
The fracture gap shows incipient consolidation including bone bridges in all three planes; fracture margins have indistinct limitations.
The fracture gap shows bone consolidation in all three planes; fracture margins are not determinable.

statement.text: The definition of Consolidation is the fracture gap shows bone consolidation in all three planes; fracture margins are not determinable.
Each Classification has a different figure.
The definition of Incipient Consolidation is the fracture gap shows bone consolidation in all three planes; fracture margins are not determinable.
Regarding fracture healing, at 3 weeks post-surgery 25% of all cases showed no consolidation, 50% an incipient and 25%
There are five classifications of grading of fracture consolidation.
The definition of No consolidation is the fracture gap shows No consolidation including bone bridges in all three planes; fracture margins have indistinct limitations.
The definition of Consolidation is the fracture gap is visible in all three planes; fracture margins have sharp limitations.
The definition of No consolidation is the fracture gap is visible in all three planes; fracture margins have sharp limitations.
The definition of Incipient consolidation is the fracture gap shows incipient consolidation including bone bridges in all three planes; fracture margins have indistinct limitations.
